ðŸ“– Summary: Cursor Clip is a GTK4 clipboard manager for Wayland that provides a Windows 11-style clipboard history with GNOME design. It dynamically positions the clipboard history at the current mouse pointer location, offering advanced Wayland integration and automatic clipboard monitoring.
